game.name: Snatch
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Snatch is a wild twist on classic Pong—faster, flashier, and loaded with abilities. Deflect, dash, and unleash chaotic powers in fast paced matches. Battle relentless enemies in 1v1 duels or survive 1v3 chaos—dash, deflect, and dominate in fast-paced, single-player arcade mayhem.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Snatch is a wild twist on classic Pong—faster, flashier, and loaded with abilities. Deflect, dash, and unleash chaotic powers in fast paced matches. Battle relentless enemies in 1v1 duels or survive 1v3 chaos—dash, deflect, and dominate in fast-paced, single-player arcade mayhem.
